title: Create Broker: Fields length/pattern validations
custom_preconds: Logged in user should have 'BrokerAdmin' role assigned to access Broker Administration

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to the PV Application with valid credentials
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user should be able to launch and login the application successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Navigate to the Ticketing Setup menu -> 'Broker Administration' menu item
custom_steps_separated.expected: Brokers landing page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on 'CREATE NEW BROKER' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: New Broker page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify that UUID field should be ReadOnly (Will be Blank)
custom_steps_separated.expected: UUID field should be ReadOnly and blank

custom_steps_separated.content:
Validate that in field Broker Name:
1. User is unable to enter more than 64 characters 
2. User is able to enter characters (a-z,A-Z,0-9,-,_) only and no character is allowed except these
custom_steps_separated.expected: Field Broker name should allow valid length/pattern of characters

custom_steps_separated.content:
Validate that in field Broker Email:
1. User is unable to enter more than 255 characters 
2. User is able to enter email in valid email format only
custom_steps_separated.expected: Field Broker Email should allow valid length/pattern of characters

custom_steps_separated.content:
Validate that in field Broker Phone #:
User is able to enter characters (0-9,-,+,(,)) only and in [nnn-nnn-nnnn] pattern
custom_steps_separated.expected: Field Broker Phone should allow valid length/pattern of characters

custom_steps_separated.content: Validate that Status Radio button field has default value as Active
custom_steps_separated.expected: Status field should have default value as Active

custom_steps_separated.content: Validate that Locked checkbox field has default value inactive/not selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: Locked field should have default value as Inactive

custom_steps_separated.content: Validate that Locked Reason field is disabled by default unless the Locked field is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: Locked Reason field should be disabled by default

custom_steps_separated.content:
Validate that in Locked Reason field:
User is unable to enter more than 255 characters
custom_steps_separated.expected: Field Locked Reason should allow valid length/pattern of characters

custom_steps_separated.content: Validate that Apply Changes button is disabled by default but gets enabled and highlighted in red color if user enters value in any of the fields
custom_steps_separated.expected: Apply Changes button should be disabled by default and gets enabled on entering value in any of the fields

custom_steps_separated.content: Validate that Reset button is disabled by default but gets enabled if user enters value in any of the fields
custom_steps_separated.expected: Reset button should be disabled by default and gets enabled on entering value in any of the fields

custom_steps_separated.expected: Ticket sale should be done successfully and order id should be generated

custom_steps_separated.content: Note the order id and fetch the ticket ids for that order from data base
custom_steps_separated.expected: Ticket ids should be get fetched successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Now launch the postman application and make a GET call for "MMS FAN TO FAN VALIDATE" using-
{{base_url}}/api/v2/mms/tickets/validate?patronAccountId=36581&type=FAN_TO_FAN&patronAccountId=xxxxx&ticketId=yyyyyyyy&ticketId=zzzzzzzz
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should give the successful response including contiguousSeatTicketIds information

custom_steps_separated.content: From "GET MMS F2F VALIDATE" API response, the contiguous Seats should be "," separated
custom_steps_separated.expected: The contiguous seats are "," separated

custom_steps_separated.content: From "GET MMS F2F VALIDATE" API response, the non-contiguous Seats should be “|” separated
custom_steps_separated.expected: The non-contiguous seats are “|” separated

custom_steps_separated.expected: The response is same for Broker as it is for F2F
